A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Pacing was off\, themes were nearly incoherent. Character development was average to below average and most of the movie was spent wondering why I felt so disappointed. While certainly not as bad as the prequels this definitely comes up short of my already mediocre expectations of the newest trilogy following the force awakens. Now not everything about this movie was awful\, there were some seriously beautifully shot scenes\, and the action in this movie is great. However\, this movie will clearly go down as a below average film and frankly just dissapointing.
